attributes.action: Ensure that the Home Secretary consistenty formulates policy in line with scientific evidence presented in the best interests of society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent disgusting dismissal of Professor David Nutt, we petition the Prime Minister and his cabinet to take the advice of free thinking, free speaking scientists and to ensure policy if formulated in line with scientific evidence. Furthermore, we petition the Prime Minister to ban the politicisation of scientific advisors and to ensure that policy is directly and transparently linked to evidence without exception.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
